original_text:
Crystal Quest Frostlands
Se siete alla ricerca di una slot che abbia una grafica di altissimo livello e opzioni di gioco interessanti, allora siete nel posto giusto. Crystal Quest Frostlands è il nuovo capitolo della slot targata Thunderkick e ha come protagonista una guerriera che lotta contro degli Jeti demoniaci per nulla amichevoli. Rispetto ai capitoli precedenti, qui cambia giusto qualche funzione e lo scenario di gioco.
La schermata si apre con una ragazza immersa nello spazio che cammina su un tappeto di luce mentre ai lati scorrono i tanti bonus a cui potremo aspirare durante il gioco.
Un paesaggio innevato da cui emergono cristalli di ghiaccio a forma di parallelepipedo fa da sfondo alla griglia di gioco, che non ha una vera e propria cornice in quanto i rulli sono formati da blocchi di ghiaccio che cadono dall’alto.
Sulla destra vengono indicati i moltiplicatori che si possono ottenere durante il gioco regolare, in basso ci sono le informazioni sulla nostra scommessa e a destra i tasti per variare la puntata, per l’Autoplay e per lo Start. Qualche simpatica animazione accompagna le vincite e l’avvio dei giochi bonus, durante gli Spin invece avremo come sottofondo musicale una melodia molto blanda e per nulla disturbante, oltre ai classici effetti sonori, composti soprattutto dal rumore dei lastroni di ghiaccio che si staccano dal soffitto.
Caratteristiche della slot
Il sistema di gioco è quello così detto “a cascata”: ogni volta che si ha una combinazione pagante, i simboli esplodono e vengono sostituiti da nuovi simboli che possono dar vita a ulteriori combinazioni vincenti. La griglia di gioco ha 6 rulli e 4 righe e ben 4.096 modi per vincere. La vincita massima è di 15.000 volte la puntata, niente male davvero!
Possiamo dire che Crystal Quest Frostlands è un gioco adatto a tutti se si tiene conto che le scommesse variano da un minimo di 0,10 € a un massimo di 100 € per ogni giro.
La funzione Autoplay ci permette di selezionare da 5 a 5.000 giri automatici, compresi alcuni limiti molto utili perché una volta raggiunti interrompono la funzione, così da non dover tenere sempre sotto controllo il nostro saldo.
La volatilità è alta, si vince meno di frequente ma sempre importi di livello, e il valore RTP è pari al 96,16%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Partiamo col dire che tutti i simboli possono apparire in 3 misure diverse. Quella più piccola è la dimensione di un singolo slot, in quella 2×2 il simbolo occupa 4 slot e nella 3×3 addirittura 9. Ogni volta che si avvia il sistema a cascata, si ottiene un moltiplicatore progressivo che si azzera nel momento in cui si esauriscono le combinazioni vincenti. Le gemme colorate sono i simboli che pagano di meno, ce ne sono ben 9. A seguire troviamo il mostro e infine la guerriera.
Il simbolo Wild è una W fatta di cristalli, ha funzione di Jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter.
Lo scrigno dorato è il nostro simbolo Scatter e ci ricompensa con 12 Free Spins. Ogni Scatter aggiuntivo offre 3 giri extra gratuiti. Durante il gioco Bonus le cose cambiano leggermente, perché sono sufficienti 2 Scatter per ottenere 3 giri gratuiti. Quando non si verificano combinazioni vincenti, ogni Wild comparso sulla griglia di gioco distrugge i simboli sul rullo e sulla linea di appartenenza (eccetto gli Scatter), quindi in orizzontale e in verticale. I simboli rimossi verranno poi rimpiazzati da altri simboli. Altra cosa importante è che durante il bonus, il moltiplicatore non si azzera.

raw_translation.response:
Crystal Quest Frostlands

Looking for a high-quality slot game with interesting game options? Look no further than Crystal Quest Frostlands, the latest chapter in Thunderkick's slot series. Here, a warrior fights against demonic yeti to win big prizes. The game features a beautiful space environment with great bonuses that players can aspire to achieve. The snowy landscape background with crystal clear ice blocks falling from above in a cascading reels style. The game grid features 6 reels, 4 rows, and 4096 ways to win. The maximum win is 15,000 times the bet, which is quite impressive! 

Crystal Quest Frostlands is suitable for everyone as the bets vary from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €100 per spin. The AutoPlay function allows players to set up to 5,000 automatic spins with useful limiting settings to stop the feature at certain limits.

The volatility is high, which means players may not win frequently, but every win is at a higher level. The RTP value is 96.16%.

Symbols and Features

All symbols come in three different sizes. The smallest is a single slot, followed by a 2×2 symbol that occupies 4 slots and a 3×3 symbol that occupies 9 slots. Each Scatter symbol offers 3 free spins. The colored gems are the lowest paying symbols with 9 variations available, the monster follows and the warrior is the highest paying symbol. The Wild symbol is a W made out of crystals substituting for all symbols except Scatter. 

Two Scatter symbols offer 3 extra free spins during regular play, but during the bonus round, the same is achieved with just one Scatter symbol. During gameplay, whenever there is a Wild symbol present on the reels, all symbols on that line or reel will be destroyed (except Scatter). Therefore, this will reset the cascading reels mechanism but offers a higher potential for subsequent wins as new symbols replace removed ones. It is also worth noting that the multiplier during the bonus round does not reset. 

Experience the thrill of the Crystal Quest Frostlands!

message.content:
Crystal Quest Frostlands

Looking for a high-quality slot game with interesting game options? Look no further than Crystal Quest Frostlands, the latest chapter in Thunderkick's slot series. Here, a warrior fights against demonic yeti to win big prizes. The game features a beautiful space environment with great bonuses that players can aspire to achieve. The snowy landscape background with crystal clear ice blocks falling from above in a cascading reels style. The game grid features 6 reels, 4 rows, and 4096 ways to win. The maximum win is 15,000 times the bet, which is quite impressive! 

Crystal Quest Frostlands is suitable for everyone as the bets vary from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €100 per spin. The AutoPlay function allows players to set up to 5,000 automatic spins with useful limiting settings to stop the feature at certain limits.

The volatility is high, which means players may not win frequently, but every win is at a higher level. The RTP value is 96.16%.

Symbols and Features

All symbols come in three different sizes. The smallest is a single slot, followed by a 2×2 symbol that occupies 4 slots and a 3×3 symbol that occupies 9 slots. Each Scatter symbol offers 3 free spins. The colored gems are the lowest paying symbols with 9 variations available, the monster follows and the warrior is the highest paying symbol. The Wild symbol is a W made out of crystals substituting for all symbols except Scatter. 

Two Scatter symbols offer 3 extra free spins during regular play, but during the bonus round, the same is achieved with just one Scatter symbol. During gameplay, whenever there is a Wild symbol present on the reels, all symbols on that line or reel will be destroyed (except Scatter). Therefore, this will reset the cascading reels mechanism but offers a higher potential for subsequent wins as new symbols replace removed ones. It is also worth noting that the multiplier during the bonus round does not reset. 

Experience the thrill of the Crystal Quest Frostlands!

raw_translation.response:
Crystal Quest Frostlands is the latest addition to the Thunderkick's slot series that features a warrior fighting against demon Jetis in an icy landscape. If you're looking for a slot game with top-notch graphics and exciting gameplay options, then this is the game for you. The high-quality graphics showcase a girl walking on a carpet of light in space with different bonuses displayed on the sides that you can aspire to during gameplay.

The game takes place on a board surrounded by a snowy landscape with ice crystals of parallelepiped form jutting out. The reels consist of ice-blocks that fall from above, and winning combinations explode to be replaced by new symbols, leading to even more winning combinations. With 6 reels and 4 rows, there are 4,096 ways to win, and you can bet anywhere from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €100 per spin.

The Autoplay feature allows you to select up to 5,000 automatic spins with several useful limits that you can set to stop the function, so you don't have to keep an eye on your balance.

The game has high volatility, so you may not win very frequently, but the winnings are significant, up to 15,000 times the bet. The game's RTP is 96.16%, and the Wild symbol, represented by a W made of crystals, acts as a Jolly to substitute all symbols except the Scatter.

The Scatter symbol is a golden chest that rewards you with 12 free spins, and each additional Scatter provides three additional free spins. With two Scatters, you get three free spins during the bonus game. When there are no more winning combinations, each Wild that appears on the reels removes the symbols on its line, except for the Scatters, vertically and horizontally. The symbols that are removed are then replaced, and the multiplier does not reset during the bonus game.

Crystal Quest Frostlands is suitable for every gambler, thanks to its lovely graphics, a high number of ways to win and fun bonus features.

The Autoplay feature allows you to select up to 5,000 automatic spins with several useful limits that you can set to stop the function, so you don't have to keep an eye on your balance.

response.headline: Winning opportunities and maximum win

response.headline: Betting range
response.content: Crystal Quest Frostlands is suitable for all players with a minimum betting amount of €0.10 and a maximum bet limit of €100 per spin. The AutoPlay setting allows up to 5,000 automatic spins.

response.headline: Game features: cascading reels, Scatters, Wilds, bonus round
response.content: The game features cascading reels whereby all symbols on winning lines or reels disappear, and new symbols replace them. The game also has Scatter symbols that offer 3 free spins each and a Wild symbol that substitutes all other symbols except the Scatter. The game features several thrilling options, including cascading reels, Scatters, Wilds, and a bonus game that makes it a well-rounded and exciting game to play.

review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Crystal Quest Frostlands".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Gameplay Features
Winning Opportunities

Review: Crystal Quest Frostlands

Looking for a high-quality slot game with interesting game options? Look no further than Crystal Quest Frostlands, the latest chapter in Thunderkick's slot series. Here, a warrior fights against demonic yeti to win big prizes. The game features a beautiful space environment with great bonuses that players can aspire to achieve. The snowy landscape background with crystal clear ice blocks falling from above in a cascading reels style. The game grid features 6 reels, 4 rows, and 4096 ways to win. The maximum win is 15,000 times the bet, which is quite impressive! 

Crystal Quest Frostlands is suitable for everyone as the bets vary from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €100 per spin. The AutoPlay function allows players to set up to 5,000 automatic spins with useful limiting settings to stop the feature at certain limits.

The volatility is high, which means players may not win frequently, but every win is at a higher level. The RTP value is 96.16%.

Symbols and Features

All symbols come in three different sizes. The smallest is a single slot, followed by a 2×2 symbol that occupies 4 slots and a 3×3 symbol that occupies 9 slots. Each Scatter symbol offers 3 free spins. The colored gems are the lowest paying symbols with 9 variations available, the monster follows and the warrior is the highest paying symbol. The Wild symbol is a W made out of crystals substituting for all symbols except Scatter. 

Two Scatter symbols offer 3 extra free spins during regular play, but during the bonus round, the same is achieved with just one Scatter symbol. During gameplay, whenever there is a Wild symbol present on the reels, all symbols on that line or reel will be destroyed (except Scatter). Therefore, this will reset the cascading reels mechanism but offers a higher potential for subsequent wins as new symbols replace removed ones. It is also worth noting that the multiplier during the bonus round does not reset. 

Experience the thrill of the Crystal Quest Frostlands!

response.headline: Crystal Quest Frostlands: A Frozen Adventure with Cascading Reels, Scatters, Wilds, and Bonus Round
response.content:
Get ready to take a snowy adventure with the Crystal Quest Frostlands slot game, where the exciting features will keep you warm and your wallet flush with cash.

One of the standout features in this game is the cascading reels. It's as if Mother Nature herself is playing, as winning symbols disappear and make way for new ones to fall into place. It's like an avalanche of winnings! Of course, if you need a break from all the excitement, you can always hit the pause button and brew some hot cocoa before hitting spin again.

The game also features Scatters to add to the excitement. When they appear, you get three free spins each time. It's like getting a respite from the cold at a nearby hot spring. The Wild symbol is a savior in this game. It replaces all other symbols except the Scatter. It's like having a hot cup of tea on a freezing winter night - it makes everything better. If a Wild symbol is present, all symbols on that line or reel will be destroyed (except the Scatters), and new symbols will come tumbling down.

The bonus round is the cherry on top of this frozen adventure. Landing three or more Scatters on the reels will transport you to this exciting round. The multiplier keeps climbing, and the best part is that it doesn't reset! Plus, by landing just one Scatter symbol, you could access additional free spins! It's as exhilarating as hitting the slopes on a snowboard!

So put on your thermal socks and jump into the world of Crystal Quest Frostlands. With cascading reels, Scatters, Wilds, and bonus rounds, this game is sure to keep you entertained, and who knows, you may just hit the jackpot!

meta.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Crystal Quest Frostlands".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Gameplay Features

Crystal Quest Frostlands features an action-packed adventure as players take on demonic yeti alongside a warrior character. The game has 6 reels, 4 rows, and 4096 ways to win, with symbols of varying sizes. The game also offers cascading reels, Wild symbols, Scatter symbols, and free spins with increasing multipliers. The AutoPlay function is available for up to 5,000 automatic spins with useful limiting settings to stop the feature at certain limits.

Winning Opportunities

Crystal Quest Frostlands offers a potential maximum win of 15,000 times the bet. The volatility is high, but the RTP value is 96.16%, ensuring a fair experience for players. The cascading reels mechanism offers multiple chances for wins with the possibility of a multiplier increase during the free spins round. With three different sizes of symbols, players have more opportunities to create winning combinations.

Design and Graphics

Crystal Quest Frostlands has a visually stunning design that transports players to a snowy landscape with falling ice crystals. The game features a space motif with the warrior character fighting against demonic yeti. The symbols include various colored gems, monsters, and the warrior character, all beautifully designed with attention to detail. The game's graphics and animations are smooth, making for an engaging and immersive experience.

Betting Range

Crystal Quest Frostlands is suitable for all players due to its betting range. Players can bet as little as €0.10 or as much as €100 per spin. The AutoPlay function also makes it easy for players to set their desired number of automatic spins with limiting settings to stop the feature at certain limits.

Player Appeal

Crystal Quest Frostlands has a broad appeal, from casual players to high rollers. The game's exciting gameplay features, winning opportunities, and visually stunning design make for an enjoyable experience. The potential for big wins is a draw for experienced players, while the game's easy-to-use interface and AutoPlay function cater to new players. Overall, Crystal Quest Frostlands is an impressive addition to Thunderkick's slot series and will satisfy any slot game enthusiast.

faq.question: What is Crystal Quest Frostlands?
faq.answer: Crystal Quest Frostlands is a slot game developed by Thunderkick featuring a warrior fighting against demonic yetis to win big prizes.

faq.question: What are the features of Crystal Quest Frostlands?
faq.answer: Crystal Quest Frostlands features a snowy landscape background, cascading reels, a 6x4 game grid with 4096 ways to win, and a maximum win of 15,000 times the bet. It also has Wild and Scatter symbols, three different sized symbols, and a high volatility with an RTP of 96.16%.

faq.question: What is the minimum and maximum bet in Crystal Quest Frostlands?
faq.answer: The minimum bet in Crystal Quest Frostlands is €0.10, and the maximum bet is €100 per spin.

faq.question: Can players use AutoPlay in Crystal Quest Frostlands?
faq.answer: Yes, players can use AutoPlay in Crystal Quest Frostlands to set up to 5,000 automatic spins with helpful limiting settings to stop the feature at certain limits.

faq.question: What is the Wild symbol in Crystal Quest Frostlands?
faq.answer: The Wild symbol in Crystal Quest Frostlands is a W made out of crystals, which substitutes for all symbols except Scatter.

faq.question: What is the highest paying symbol in Crystal Quest Frostlands?
faq.answer: The highest paying symbol in Crystal Quest Frostlands is the warrior.

faq.question: What does the Scatter symbol do in Crystal Quest Frostlands?
faq.answer: Each Scatter symbol in Crystal Quest Frostlands offers three free spins, and two Scatter symbols offer three extra free spins during regular play. During the bonus round, one Scatter symbol is enough to achieve three extra free spins.

faq.question: Does the multiplier reset during the bonus round in Crystal Quest Frostlands?
faq.answer: No, the multiplier does not reset during the bonus round in Crystal Quest Frostlands as it does during regular play.

Review: Crystal Quest Frostlands

Looking for a high-quality slot game with interesting game options? Look no further than Crystal Quest Frostlands, the latest chapter in Thunderkick's slot series. Here, a warrior fights against demonic yeti to win big prizes. The game features a beautiful space environment with great bonuses that players can aspire to achieve. The snowy landscape background with crystal clear ice blocks falling from above in a cascading reels style. The game grid features 6 reels, 4 rows, and 4096 ways to win. The maximum win is 15,000 times the bet, which is quite impressive! 

Crystal Quest Frostlands is suitable for everyone as the bets vary from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €100 per spin. The AutoPlay function allows players to set up to 5,000 automatic spins with useful limiting settings to stop the feature at certain limits.

The volatility is high, which means players may not win frequently, but every win is at a higher level. The RTP value is 96.16%.

Symbols and Features

All symbols come in three different sizes. The smallest is a single slot, followed by a 2×2 symbol that occupies 4 slots and a 3×3 symbol that occupies 9 slots. Each Scatter symbol offers 3 free spins. The colored gems are the lowest paying symbols with 9 variations available, the monster follows and the warrior is the highest paying symbol. The Wild symbol is a W made out of crystals substituting for all symbols except Scatter. 

Two Scatter symbols offer 3 extra free spins during regular play, but during the bonus round, the same is achieved with just one Scatter symbol. During gameplay, whenever there is a Wild symbol present on the reels, all symbols on that line or reel will be destroyed (except Scatter). Therefore, this will reset the cascading reels mechanism but offers a higher potential for subsequent wins as new symbols replace removed ones. It is also worth noting that the multiplier during the bonus round does not reset. 

Experience the thrill of the Crystal Quest Frostlands!
